Lumina International School

Nurturing Young Minds with Islamic Values

Welcome to Lumina International School

At Lumina International School, we provide a nurturing environment where children from play group to grade 5 receive quality education rooted in Islamic values. Our dedicated faculty and modern facilities ensure that every child develops academically, spiritually, and socially.

Our Programs

Early Years

Play Group & Kindergarten programs designed to foster curiosity and love for learning in a safe, nurturing environment.

Primary Education

Grades 1-5 with comprehensive curriculum combining academic excellence with Islamic studies and character development.

Islamic Studies

Integrated Islamic education teaching Quran, Arabic, and Islamic values throughout all grade levels.
